title: Colors of the Year

metadata.description: Learn about Colors of the Year with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Every year, the
Pantone Color Institute
evaluates the colors shown by fashion designers at the New York Fashion Week.
This information is used to create The Pantone Color of the Year and the Pantone Fashion Color Report with the top
fashion colors for the coming season.
2025 Mocha Mousse
HEX: #A47864
PANTONE 17-1230

PANTONE 13-1023

RGB(146, 168, 209)

quiz.question: What is This information?
options:
used to create The Pantone Color of the Year and the Pantone Fashion Color Report with the top
fashion colors for the coming season
quiz.explanation:
The correct definition of This information is 'used to create The Pantone Color of the Year and the Pantone Fashion Color Report with the top
fashion colors for the coming season'.

quiz.question: Which best describes the main purpose of this c feature?
quiz.explanation: This feature serves multiple purposes in software development.

summary: This tutorial covers Colors of the Year concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use Colors of the Year effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of Colors of the Year and how to apply it in your projects.
